results.name: Expansion of (1-x)/(1-x^2+2*x^3).
comment: Number of compositions of n into parts congruent to (0,2} mod 3 (offset 2). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Feb 09 2005
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,1,-2).
maple: seq(coeff(series((1-x)/(1-x^2+2*x^3), x, n+1), x, n), n = 0..60); # _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 04 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2002
